test.name: Login Success เข้าสู่ระบบด้วยอีเมลและรหัสที่ถูกต้อง

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//form//button[@type='submit' and (contains(normalize-space(.),'เข้าสู่ระบบ') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Login') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Sign in'))]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Login Fails การเข้าสู่ระบบด้วยอีเมลที่ผิดฟอร์แมต

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//form//button[@type='submit' and (contains(normalize-space(.),'เข้าสู่ระบบ') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Login') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Sign in'))]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Page should have contained element 'xpath=//form//button[@type='submit']/preceding::div[contains(@class,'MuiBox-root')][normalize-space()][1]' but did not.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.status: Page should have contained element 'xpath=//form//button[@type='submit']/preceding::div[contains(@class,'MuiBox-root')][normalize-space()][1]' but did not.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Login Fails การเข้าสู่ระบบโดยไม่กรอกอีเมลเเละรหัสผ่าน

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//form//button[@type='submit' and (contains(normalize-space(.),'เข้าสู่ระบบ') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Login') or contains(normalize-space(.),'Sign in'))]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Should Not Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are equal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Browser validation message: Please fill out this field.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

test.name: Login Success การทำงานปุ่มสมัครสมาชิก

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[contains(@href,'register') or contains(normalize-space(.),'สมัครสมาชิก')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Login Success การทำงานปุ่มลืมรหัสผ่าน

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//form//a[contains(@href,'forgot') or contains(@href,'forget') or contains(normalize-space(.),'ลืมรหัสผ่าน')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.msg: Location did not contain 'http://localhost:5173/forget' in 10 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.status: Location did not contain 'http://localhost:5173/forget' in 10 seconds.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Location did not contain 'http://localhost:5173/forget' in 10 seconds.

kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//*[@data-testid='VisibilityOffIcon']' did not appear in 3 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//*[@data-testid='VisibilityOffIcon']' did not appear in 3 seconds.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
